00044 typedef enum l4vcpu_irq_state_t
00045 {
00046   L4VCPU_IRQ_STATE_DISABLED = 0,             
00047   L4VCPU_IRQ_STATE_ENABLED  = L4_VCPU_F_IRQ, 
00048 } l4vcpu_irq_state_t;
00049 
00050 typedef l4_umword_t l4vcpu_state_t;
00051 typedef void (*l4vcpu_event_hndl_t)(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu);
00052 typedef void (*l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t)(l4_utcb_t *utcb);

00218 /* Implementations */

00220 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00221 #include <l4/vcpu/vcpu_arch.h>
00222 
00223 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00224 l4vcpu_state_t
00225 l4vcpu_state(l4_vcpu_state_t const *vcpu) L4_NOTHROW
00226 {
00227   return vcpu->state;
00228 }
00229 
00230 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00231 void
00232 l4vcpu_irq_disable(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu) L4_NOTHROW
00233 {
00234   vcpu->state &= ~L4_VCPU_F_IRQ;
00235   l4_barrier();
00236 }
00237 
00238 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00239 l4vcpu_irq_state_t
00240 l4vcpu_irq_disable_save(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu) L4_NOTHROW
00241 {
00242   l4vcpu_irq_state_t s = (l4vcpu_irq_state_t)l4vcpu_state(vcpu);
00243   l4vcpu_irq_disable(vcpu);
00244   return s;
00245 }
00246 
00247 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00248 void
00249 l4vcpu_wait(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00250             l4_timeout_t to,
00251             l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00252             l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) L4_NOTHROW
00253 {
00254   l4vcpu_irq_disable(vcpu);
00255   setup_ipc(utcb);
00256   vcpu->i.tag = l4_ipc_wait(utcb, &vcpu->i.label, to);
00257   if (EXPECT_TRUE(!l4_msgtag_has_error(vcpu->i.tag)))
00258     do_event_work_cb(vcpu);
00259 }
00260 
00261 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00262 void
00263 l4vcpu_irq_enable(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00264                   l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00265                   l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) L4_NOTHROW
00266 {
00267   while (1)
00268     {
00269       vcpu->state |= L4_VCPU_F_IRQ;
00270       l4_barrier();
00271 
00272       if (EXPECT_TRUE(!(vcpu->sticky_flags & L4_VCPU_SF_IRQ_PENDING)))
00273         break;
00274 
00275       l4vcpu_wait(vcpu, utcb, L4_IPC_BOTH_TIMEOUT_0,
00276                   do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc);
00277     }
00278 }
00279 
00280 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00281 void
00282 l4vcpu_irq_restore(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu, l4vcpu_irq_state_t s,
00283                    l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00284                    l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00285                    l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) L4_NOTHROW
00286 {
00287   if (s & L4_VCPU_F_IRQ)
00288     l4vcpu_irq_enable(vcpu, utcb, do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc);
00289 }
00290 
00291 L4_CV L4_INLINE
00292 void
00293 l4vcpu_halt(l4_vcpu_state_t *vcpu, l4_utcb_t *utcb,
00294             l4vcpu_event_hndl_t do_event_work_cb,
00295             l4vcpu_setup_ipc_t setup_ipc) L4_NOTHROW
00296 {
00297   l4vcpu_wait(vcpu, utcb, L4_IPC_NEVER, do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc);
00298   l4vcpu_irq_enable(vcpu, utcb, do_event_work_cb, setup_ipc);
00299 }
00300 
00301 __END_DECLS
